greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of square root of 31.
comment: Continued fraction expansion is 5 followed by {1, 1, 3, 5, 3, 1, 1, 10} repeated. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 04 2009
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
program: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=sqrt(31); for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b010486.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 04 2009
xref: Cf. A010129 (continued fraction). - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 04 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
